Class: ColorpickerControl

DrawerJs.plugins.ColorpickerControl(drawer, optionsopt)

new ColorpickerControl(drawer, optionsopt)

Creates color input for changing color; colorChangeHandler is called on color change.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
drawer DrawerJs.Drawer
options Object <optional>
 Configuration object.
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
colors Array.<String> <optional>
 Array of colors to be used.
colorsInRow number <optional>
 Number of colors for one row.
